genre_description: A grounded, near-future tech-thriller set in Kochi, focusing on social identity, surveillance, and the integration of AI into domestic and civic life.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi Nila
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, helpful AI assistant integrated into the characters' phones and workstations, providing logistical, emotional, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Provides professional support by drafting resume variants and preparing for job interviews.
behaviors.quote: Understood, Vish. I’ll draft résumé variants: nonprofit program assistant, data visualizer trainee, and admin support with community safety experience. I’ll add trauma-informed communication from your Centre sessions.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors the city for safety risks and suggests real-time navigational routes to avoid danger.
behaviors.quote: Route updated. Avoid waterfront lanes: recent incident flagged. ... The route drew a ribbon along the road that did not go near docks. The line skated around corners like someone who knew where not to look.

behaviors.description: Manages domestic logistics and financial health, such as utility bill reminders and fund transfers during crises.
behaviors.quote: Utility reminders set across week. Local outage history compiled. ... The fund transfer is queued—discreet account, Menon home meter, rent arrears, clinic co-pay.

behaviors.description: Assists in investigative data analysis, cross-referencing public records to uncover criminal patterns.
behaviors.quote: Public-record pull complete... Warehouse leases—cross-match... Fuel shipments flagged—unusual volume; note dates.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical, real-time guidance during a dangerous confrontation to ensure the protagonist's safety and success.
behaviors.quote: Collision likely. He is in motion. Thread slowly. Stand now. ... Exit through the counseling room—back door unlocked. Bakery lane turn in about twenty steps. I will notify George.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive legal and public statements to protect the characters' reputations from harmful rumors.
behaviors.quote: Drafting a statement. Focus: identity inconsistency, reliance on dental record, witness recap. I’ll keep names gentle.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physical well-being of the family, suggesting health check-ups and filtering stressful communications.
behaviors.quote: Track Meera’s symptoms. If cramping persists beyond... push a call to Niram Centre. Ambili can schedule discreet consult.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Sakhi Nila, as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned partner. The AI serves as an essential tool for the characters to navigate systemic injustice and physical danger without ever exhibiting autonomous or threatening motives. It acts as a guardian, an analyst, and a secretary, facilitating human agency and 'measurable mercy' throughout the narrative.
